rule: Only items that are typically associated with ghost stories or legends can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are mentioned or used in famous works of literature can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that have been used or symbolized in popular science fiction movies can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are associated with famous historical events can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are commonly related to or symbolized in well-known fairy tales can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are typically associated with classic board games can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are typically associated with well-known works of abstract art can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are typically associated with famous landmarks around the world can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are typically associated with popular astronomical phenomena can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are typically associated with renowned global culinary dishes can be brought to the picnic.
